appsgate.lig.proxy.PhilipsHUE.interfaces
Interface PhilipsHUEServices

All Known Implementing Classes:
PhilipsHUEAdapter
public interface PhilipsHUEServices

This is the OSGi service interface for Philips HUE adapter.

Since:
May 22, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard

Method Detail

getLightList

org.json.JSONArray getLightList()
Gets a list of all lights that have been discovered by the bridge.

Returns:
the list of light as a JSON array

getNewLights

org.json.JSONArray getNewLights()
Gets a list of lights that were discovered the last time a search for new lights was performed. The list of new lights is always deleted when a new search is started.

Returns:
the list of new lights as a JSON array

searchForNewLights

boolean searchForNewLights()
Starts a search for new lights. The bridge will search for 1 minute and will add a maximum of 15 new lights. To add further lights, the command needs to be sent again after the search has completed. If a search is already active, it will be aborted and a new search will start. When the search has finished, new lights will be available using the get new lights command. In addition, the new lights will now be available by calling get all lights.

Returns:
true when the search begin.

getLightState

org.json.JSONObject getLightState(java.lang.String bridgeIP,
                                  java.lang.String id)
Get the current light state. That method call return all the attributes corresponding to the remote light.

Parameters:
bridgeIP - the Philips HUE IP address
id - the light bulb id on the bridge
Returns:
all the light bulb attributes as an JSON object

setAttribute

boolean setAttribute(java.lang.String bridgeIP,
                     java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String attribute,
                     boolean value)
Set the attribute value for the specified light bulb identifier

Parameters:
bridgeIP - the Philips HUE IP address
id - the light bulb id on the bridge
attribute - the attribute to set
value - the new value for the attribute
Returns:
true if the value is set correctly, false otherwise

Returns:

setAttribute

boolean setAttribute(java.lang.String bridgeIP,
                     java.lang.String id,
                     org.json.JSONObject attributes)
Set a group of attribute (Batch mode)

Parameters:
bridgeIP - the Philips HUE IP address
id - the light bulb id on the bridge
attributes - all attributes to set, with name, value and the light bulb identifier on the bridge
Returns:
true if all the attribute are set and false otherwise
